content: crochet double oven glove - double thick with a glove each end this kitchen pot holder will pick up most hot pans and dishes and help you protect not just one but both hands at the same time hang it on your oven door ready for when you get out a hot casserole or cake tin the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 size approx - 27 x 6 5 inches level intermediate copyright ©2021 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-double-oven-glove/
